import React, { Component } from 'react' import '../../../Css/Train.css' class Train extends Component { constructor(props){ super(props) this.state={ Train1 : [], avail : [], res : [], } this.changeRoute=this.changeRoute.bind(this) } changeRoute(){ let path = `/Passenger`; this.props.history.push(path) } render() { this.state.Train1 = this.props.history.location.state; var obj = this.state.Train1.avail_train for (var key in obj) { if (obj.hasOwnProperty(key)) { var val = obj[key]; this.state.avail.push(val) } } var obj = this.state.Train1.reserved_train for (var key in obj) { if (obj.hasOwnProperty(key)) { var val = obj[key]; this.state.res.push(val) } } return (

Available Trains:

{ this.state.avail.map((item) => ( )) }
Train No Train Name Time of Dep. Time of Arrival Price Available Seats Booking
{item.train_id} {item.train_name} {item.departure} {item.arrival} ₹ {item.Price} {item.available_seats}

Reserved Trains:

{ this.state.res.map((item) => ( )) }
Train No Train Name Time of Dep. Time of Arrival Price Waiting List Booking
{item.train_id} {item.train_name} {item.departure} {item.arrival} ₹ {item.Price} WL-{item.reservation_queue}
) } } export default Train
